result.eng: Have the problems been overcome yet?
result.ga: ar sáraíodh na fadhbanna go fóill
result.orig: ar sáraíodh na fadhbanna go fóill
result.html: ar sáraíodh na fadhbanna go fóillHave the problems been overcome yet?
result.ponchtml: ar sáraíoḋ na faḋbanna go fóillHave the problems been overcome yet?

result.eng: A lot of problems are associated with it.
result.html: baineann go leor fadhbanna leisA lot of problems are associated with it.
result.ponchtml: baineann go leor faḋbanna leisA lot of problems are associated with it.

result.html: chothaigh sé sin fadhbanna dúinnThat caused us problems.
result.ponchtml: ċoṫaiġ sé sin faḋbanna dúinnThat caused us problems.

result.eng: How can we overcome these problems?
result.ga: conas is féidir linn na fadhbanna seo a shárú
result.orig: conas is féidir linn na fadhbanna seo a shárú
result.html: conas is féidir linn na fadhbanna seo a shárúHow can we overcome these problems?
result.ponchtml: conas is féidir linn na faḋbanna seo a ẛárúHow can we overcome these problems?

result.html: fadhbanna an aosa óigYoung people's problems.
result.ponchtml: faḋbanna an aosa óigYoung people's problems.

result.html: fadhbanna na ndaoine ógaYoung people's problems.
result.ponchtml: faḋbanna na ndaoine ógaYoung people's problems.

result.ga: tá deacrachtaí ag baint leis
result.orig: tá deacrachtaí ag baint leis
result.html: tá deacrachtaí ag baint leisThere are problems with it.
result.ponchtml: tá deacraċtaí ag baint leisThere are problems with it.

result.ga: tá go leor fadhbanna againn
result.orig: tá go leor fadhbanna againn
result.html: tá go leor fadhbanna againnWe have many problems.
result.ponchtml: tá go leor faḋbanna againnWe have many problems.

result.eng: I am happy to help you whenever you have problems.
result.ga: tá mé sásta cuidiú leat má bhíonn fadhbanna agat
result.orig: tá mé sásta cuidiú leat má bhíonn fadhbanna agat
result.html: tá mé sásta cuidiú leat má bhíonn fadhbanna agatI am happy to help you whenever you have problems.
result.ponchtml: tá mé sásta cuidiú leat má ḃíonn faḋbanna agatI am happy to help you whenever you have problems.

result.eng: We have finally overcome the problems.
result.ga: tá na fadhbanna cloíte againn faoi dheireadh
result.orig: tá na fadhbanna cloíte againn faoi dheireadh
result.html: tá na fadhbanna cloíte againn faoi dheireadhWe have finally overcome the problems.
result.ponchtml: tá na faḋbanna cloíte againn faoi ḋeireaḋWe have finally overcome the problems.

result.eng: It overcame a lot of the distribution and access problems that had been bothering journalists for a long time.
result.ga: sháraigh sé cuid mhaith de na fadhbanna seachadta agus rochtana a bhíodh ina gcrá croí ag iriseoirí le fada
result.orig: sháraigh sé cuid mhaith de na fadhbanna seachadta agus rochtana a bhíodh ina gcrá croí ag iriseoirí le fada
result.html: sháraigh sé cuid mhaith de na fadhbanna seachadta agus rochtana a bhíodh ina gcrá croí ag iriseoirí le fadaIt overcame a lot of the distribution and access problems that had been bothering journalists for a long time.
result.ponchtml: ẛáraiġ sé cuid ṁaiṫ de na faḋbanna seaċadta agus roċtana a ḃíoḋ ina gcrá croí ag iriseoirí le fadaIt overcame a lot of the distribution and access problems that had been bothering journalists for a long time.
